text:
Hi everyone, I have completed 2 CMS developer certfication form HubSpot academy and also read the docs. But i want to know if there are any other courses anywhere or maybe any other comprehensive resouces out there where i can learn all the ins and out about HubSpot development ? especially CMS ? because reading docs is eye straining and the academy videos are not enough for a comprehensive development from my point of view.

 I really want some resources where it explained in very indetail from basic development to theme, migration , staging , sanboxing, testing, api's, automation an so on. Please if there are any resources you might think that will help me in this matter please share. Thank you for your time.

Hey <@U07UZMKHTKM>, I teach a bootcamp and the first 3 weeks are pretty deep into setting up sandboxes and test accounts, learning the APIs, workflows and advanced automation. The last 3 weeks are more React CRM cards focused.
Weâ€™ll open up registration for the next one right after this current cohort finishes
